title: mris_calc
description: Simple calculator that operates on FreeSurfer curvatures and volumes.

input_file1.title: Input File 1
input_file1.description: The name of a FreeSurfer curvature overlay (e.g., rh.curv) or volume file (e.g., orig.mgz).

action.title: Action
action.description: Mathematical action to perform on the input file(s), written as a text string.

input_file2_or_float.title: Input File 2 or Float
input_file2_or_float.description: The second input for the calculation. Can be a file (e.g., rh.thickness) or a float number if the file does not exist.

output_file.title: Output File
output_file.description: Specify the output file name for the result of the calculation.

label_file.title: Label File
label_file.description: Constrain the calculation to vertices defined in the FreeSurfer label file.

verbosity.title: Verbosity
verbosity.description: Set the verbosity of the program.
